subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Kim Clijsters, the Australian Open winner, rallied to beat Bethanie Mattek-Sands, 6-7 (10), 6-2, 6-1, and lead Belgium to a 4-1 victory over the United States.
snippet: Kim Clijsters, the Australian Open winner, rallied to beat Bethanie Mattek-Sands, 6-7 (10), 6-2, 6-1, and lead Belgium to a 4-1 victory over the United States.
